00029 #include <string.h>

00031 #include <util/util.h>

00040 /*============================================================================*/
00041 /* Private data definitions.                                                  */
00042 /*============================================================================*/
00043 
00044 /*
00045  * Size of the queue used to store received datagrams.
00046  */
00047 #define LNP_QUEUE_RELIABLE_SIZE         64
00048 #define LNP_QUEUE_UNRELIABLE_SIZE       64
00049 
00050 /*
00051  * Queue used to store received datagrams
00052  */
00053 static util_queue_t queues[2];
00054 
00055 /*
00056  * 
00057  */
00058 #define QUEUE_RELIABLE          0
00059 #define QUEUE_UNRELIABLE        1
00060 
00061 /*============================================================================*/
00062 /* Private functions prototypes.                                              */
00063 /*============================================================================*/
00064 
00065 inline int get_queue_index(u_char protocol);
00066 
00067 /*============================================================================*/
00068 /* Public functions implementations.                                          */
00069 /*============================================================================*/
00070 
00071 int lnp_queue_initialize() {
00072         int return_value;
00073         
00074         return_value 
00075                         = (util_initialize_queue(&queues[QUEUE_RELIABLE], 
00076                                         LNP_QUEUE_RELIABLE_SIZE) == UTIL_OK)
00077                         && (util_initialize_queue(&queues[QUEUE_UNRELIABLE], 
00078                                         LNP_QUEUE_UNRELIABLE_SIZE) == UTIL_OK);
00079                                         
00080         return (return_value ? LNP_OK : LNP_ERROR);
00081 }
00082 /******************************************************************************/
00083 void lnp_queue_finalize() {
00084         util_finalize_queue(&queues[QUEUE_RELIABLE]);
00085         util_finalize_queue(&queues[QUEUE_UNRELIABLE]);
00086 }
00087 /******************************************************************************/ 
00088 int lnp_enqueue_datagram(net_id_t from, u_char *datagram, int length, 
00089                 u_char protocol) {
00090         int return_value;
00091         u_char *id = NULL;
00092         
00093         int queue_index = get_queue_index(protocol);
00094         if (queue_index == LNP_ERROR) {
00095                 return LNP_ERROR;
00096         }
00097         
00098         id = (u_char *)malloc(sizeof(net_id_t));
00099         if (id == NULL) {
00100                 return LNP_ERROR;
00101         }
00102         
00103         memcpy(id, from, sizeof(net_id_t));
00104         
00105         /* We are using the tag pointer to store the id. */
00106         return_value = util_enqueue(&queues[queue_index], 
00107                         (void *)id, datagram, length);
00108         return (return_value == UTIL_OK ? LNP_OK : LNP_ERROR);
00109 }
00110 /******************************************************************************/
00111 int lnp_dequeue_datagram(net_id_t from, u_char *datagram, int max, 
00112                 u_char protocol) {
00113         int return_value;
00114         u_char *id = NULL;
00115 
00116         int queue_index = get_queue_index(protocol);
00117         if (queue_index == LNP_ERROR) {
00118                 return LNP_ERROR;
00119         }
00120         
00121         return_value = util_dequeue(&queues[queue_index], (void **)&id, 
00122                         datagram, max);
00123         /* We are using the tag pointer to store the id. */
00124         if (return_value != UTIL_ERROR) {
00125                 memcpy(from, id, sizeof(net_id_t));
00126                 free(id);
00127                 return return_value;
00128         }
00129         
00130         return LNP_ERROR;
00131 }
00132 /******************************************************************************/
00133 int lnp_try_dequeue_datagram(net_id_t from, u_char *datagram, int max,
00134                 u_char protocol) {
00135         int return_value;
00136         u_char *id = NULL;
00137 
00138         int queue_index = get_queue_index(protocol);
00139         if (queue_index == LNP_ERROR) {
00140                 return LNP_ERROR;
00141         }
00142         return_value = util_try_dequeue(&queues[queue_index], (void **)&id, 
00143                         datagram, max);
00144         /* We are using the tag pointer to store the id. */
00145         if (return_value != UTIL_ERROR) {
00146                 memcpy(from, id, sizeof(net_id_t));
00147                 free(id);
00148                 return return_value;
00149         }
00150         
00151         return LNP_ERROR;
00152 }
00153 
00154 /*============================================================================*/
00155 /* Private functions implementations.                                         */
00156 /*============================================================================*/
00157 
00158 int get_queue_index(u_char protocol) {
00159         if (protocol == LNP_PROTOCOL_RELIABLE) {
00160                 return QUEUE_RELIABLE;  
00161         } else if (protocol == LNP_PROTOCOL_UNRELIABLE) {
00162                 return QUEUE_UNRELIABLE;        
00163         } else  {
00164                 return LNP_ERROR;       
00165         }
00166 }
